abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Chez Oskar restaurant in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, that has stayed true to its roots through gentrification.
lead_paragraph: Chez Oskar, in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, has stayed true to its original aesthetic in a changing neighborhood.
snippet: Chez Oskar, in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, has stayed true to its original aesthetic in a changing neighborhood.

headline.main: Fort Greene Changes. Chez Oskar Doesn’t.
